profile.name: Fernand Galiana
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering scalable and secure software solutions at Imhotep Software
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented developer with expertise in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and cloud computing platforms. Proven track record of building demo applications, contributing to open-source projects, and troubleshooting complex issues.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed scalable software solutions using Elixir, Go, JavaScript, Ruby, and SCSS.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time.
Mentored junior developers and provided code reviews to ensure best practices.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Built demo applications for clients using Angular2, Phoenix, and MongoDB.
Contributed to open-source projects like k9s and Cilium, demonstrating expertise in networking, security, and observability.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated open-source projects like k9s and Cilium.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve code quality.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed software solutions for clients using Ruby, SCSS, and MongoDB.
Troubleshot complex issues and provided updates on GitHub.
